snippet: Rackspace, a web-hosting company with a market value of more than $4 billion, has hired Morgan Stanley to evaluate a sale or other strategic options, after being approached by potential suitors.
abstract: Rackspace, a web-hosting company with a market value of more than $4 billion, has hired Morgan Stanley to evaluate a sale or other strategic options, after being approached by potential suitors.

headline.main: Rackspace Hires Morgan Stanley to Explore Options
